categories: Category:Unidentified members of the Ohnaka Gang

nodes.text: This pirate was present at Hondo Ohnaka's base on Florrum when Count Dooku was taken there. The pirate stood ready with a gun aimed the Dooku during Ohnaka's conversation with the Sith Lord. The pirate attended a banquet a short time later and stood over a drunken pirate collapsed on the floor.

Much later, the pirate, along with Gwarm, Parsel, and other pirates boarded the Jedi ship Crucible in order to steal the lightsaber crystals that the Jedi Initiates had with them. After boarding the Crucible, Hondo Ohnaka ordered that the lightsaber crystals be found and for his men to kill anyone who stood in their way. The pirates smoked the Jedi out, however because Petro, one of the Jedi, had a faulty lightsaber, he through it at a pirate, which caused an explosion that knocked out all the pirates, including this one.

Ahsoka Tano got the each of the Younglings and Professor Huyang to safety after knocking this pirate out a second time, and ordered for Zatt to activate the engines and break apart the connecting bridge which would cause a vacuum and push all of the pirates out into space. This pirate, along with the rest of the pirates, were sucked out of the ship and into the connecting bridge of the pirate's cruiser. One pirate was unlucky and was drawn into space. This pirate managed to stay in the connecting bridge however the pirate was pushed by Ahsoka Tano back into the pirates' ship using the force. Ahsoka was knocked into the same bridge and was captured by the pirates. This pirate, along with the rest of the surviving pirates, later held a bound Tano at gunpoint. This pirate was at Hondo's base on Florrum while Ahsoka was being held captive, and later watched as Hondo's base was temporarily captured.

Two years later, this pirate was present during the Skirmish on Florrum. He listened with other pirates as two Sith threatened to attack the loyalists with many of Ohnaka's own men. Three of Hondo Ohnaka's ships and their crews had betrayed the notorious pirate. The ships entered Florrum's atmosphere and shot at Ohnaka loyalists while Ohnaka's men returned the fire. This pirate rushed to attack the traitors as they exited their ships.

As Hondo noticed his men were slowly dying and becoming outnumbered, he ordered his men to retreat. This pirate shot at the enemy pirates a few more times before he joined the others. This pirate was waiting with Hondo when Obi-Wan Kenobi, who had decided to aid their faction, arrived. There the pirates and Kenobi developed a plan: Kenobi would lead the two leaders of the other faction to a narrow passageway, while Hondo would blast the passageway closed, in the meantime, the Ohnaka loyalists would set up an ambush against the traitors. The plan went well, with the traitors even ending up uniting with the other pirates.

As a means of celebrating their reunification, they decided to attack the two former leaders and get a hold of their riches. The pirates succeeded in hindering one of the leaders, however at least two were killed.The leaders got to their ship, but one of the pirates managed to shoot it down. Unknown to the pirates and Kenobi, the leaders ended up surviving in an escape pod, while the pirates ended up with many credits and weaponry.
